text: The men's football tournament at the 2020 Summer Olympics was held in Japan from 22 July to 7 August 2021. It was postponed because of the COVID-19 pandemic. Only players born after 1 January 1997 could play in this tournament, but each team was allowed 3 older players. == Qualification == Qualified Teams Team Qualified because align=left Top 4 teams of the 2019 UEFA Under-21 Championship align=left Top 3 teams of the 2019 Africa U-23 Cup of Nations Top 3 teams of the 2020 AFC U-23 Championship Top 2 teams of the 2020 CONMEBOL Pre-Olympic Tournament Top 2 teams of the 2020 CONCACAF Olympic Qualifying Championship == Group stage == === Group A === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 3 3 0 0 7 1 +6 9 2 3 2 0 1 8 3 +5 6 3 3 1 0 2 5 11 –6 3 4 3 0 0 3 3 8 –5 0 === Group B === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 3 2 0 1 10 1 +9 6 2 3 1 1 1 3 3 0 4 3 3 1 1 1 1 4 –3 4 4 3 1 0 2 3 9 –6 3 === Group C === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 3 1 2 0 2 1 +1 5 2 3 1 1 1 2 1 +1 4 3 3 1 1 1 2 3 –1 4 4 3 1 0 2 2 3 –1 3 === Group D === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 3 2 1 0 7 3 +4 7 2 3 1 2 0 3 2 +1 5 3 3 1 1 1 6 7 –1 4 4 3 0 0 3 4 8 –4 0 == Knockout stage == == References == Category:Olympic football tournaments Category:2020 in association football Category:2021 in association football
title: Football at the 2020 Summer Olympics – Men's tournament
